column4: my computer has finally crapped out *the one i share with my brothers and sister*. It had windows xp, and that is all they are used to. Do you think I might be able to switch over to ubuntu/kubuntu without confusing them TOO much, haha. Basically I want to know if anyone else has had a family computer that they switched to ubuntu/kubuntu and how their family reacted
well, mostly for music and internet. My brother has an ipod and so do i. Umm, dvd playablility, burning cds audio, files, and iso's.
I am the only person who really plays games on it *the video was messed up before the computer died*
I find banshee and gtkpod work perfectly for the ipod...
